title: Ice Age National Scenic Trail: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar          The Ice Age Trail Alliance and its local volunteer chapters host special events, guided hikes, and workdays throughout the year along the entire length of the Ice Age Trail. An on-line Schedule of Events is maintained on the foundation’s website.            Search for Events       By Date     Start Date      End Date           By Keyword By Keyword        Search          Upcoming Events   Sorry, but there are no events between 08/14/2016 and 09/13/2016
